newsitem.title: INDIA: India Infosys joins National Depository Ltd.
newsitem.headline: India Infosys joins National Depository Ltd.

text.p: Indian software firm Infosys Technologies said it signed an agreement with National Securities Depository Ltd to enable its shares to be traded in a paperless form.
It said dematerialisation of shares offered advantages of greater liquidity and quicker registration of transfers.

"Depositaries also offer exemption of payment of stamp duty on transfer, immediate entitlement of all rights associated with the securities and elimination of financial loss due to loss of physical share certificates," Infosys said in a statement.
